Uses of Package
fasper.base

Packages that use fasper.base
fasper Contains classes needed to activate the testing framework. 
fasper.base Contains basic classes used by Fasperunner and by plugins. 
fasper.gm This one contains default implementations for test parser and test activation. 
 

Classes in fasper.base used by fasper
ActivationDescriptor
          Describes ParserActivation inherited classes.
ASTComparator
          Comparator common interface.
ASTFilter
          Common interface for token text filters.
ParserActivation
          Common interface for all parser activation.
TestWriter
          Saves the checked AST to a user-defined z-test format.
 

Classes in fasper.base used by fasper.base

          Common interface for all parser activation.
 

Classes in fasper.base used by fasper.gm

          Describes ParserActivation inherited classes.

          Common interface for test activations.
